goal.name: Educollector
goal.desc: Proud owner of the entire collection of confiscatable objects.

goal.name: Kleptomaniac
goal.desc: That's your lot, you own all of the objects in the game! Assuming there are no more updates!

goal.name: Applied Beta Tester
goal.desc: Participated in the beta test

goal.name: Completed objective bonuses
goal.desc: Number of pupils you have defeated which were sent by your friends

goal.name: One-shots !
goal.desc: Number of pupils defeated in one turn

goal.name: Authority
goal.desc: Represented by Sheriff John Norray - Born in 1864, disappeared on horseback on the 21st of December 1901 at Groom Lake.

goal.name: Discovery
goal.desc: Represented by Captain Jack McNorroy - Born in 1702, disappeared at sea on the 21st of December 1740 off the north west of Puerto Rico.

goal.name: Duty
goal.desc: Represented by the Knight Templar Jean Nauret - Born in 1410, mysteriously disappeared on the 21st of December 1482 at the summit of Bugarach.

goal.name: Respect
goal.desc: Represented by General Julius Caius Norius - Born in 52BC, disappeared during the night of 21st of December in the year 0 in the Archipelago of San Torini.

goal.name: Knowledge
goal.desc: Represented by the Architect Noris - Born in approximately 2000BC, disappeared mysteriously one 21st of December on the Giza Plateau.

goal.name: Loyalty
goal.desc: Represented by the High Priest Naruhatl - Born in approximately 12000BC, disappeared mysteriously one 21st of December at Puma Punku.

title.name: Loyal to the high priest Naruhatl

goal.name: Sharing
goal.desc: Represented by the hunter Noru'k - Appeared mysteriously during the Cretaceous period 65 million years ago in the Yucatan.

goal.name: Patience
goal.desc: The Value of the Present moment. Represented by the Professor James Norray.

goal.name: Gardian of Ultra Pink
goal.desc: You are now in possession of all the pink objects that can be confiscated. You are now a Guardian of Ultra Pink. Congratulations!

goal.name: For Ponyland !
goal.desc: You have saved all the little ponies in the game. You are now a member of a famous secret society. Congratulations...

goal.name: Sight Beyond Sight
goal.desc: Thunder... Thunder... Thunder...

goal.name: Troll Master
goal.desc: You have acquired the full troll collection. Those little guys with the 80s hair that you've been confiscating.

goal.name: Frog Master
goal.desc: You've finally captured all of these wretched paper beasts! They're now yours though, they will obey your beck and call.

goal.name: Flea Master
goal.desc: You have acquired all existing rubber fleas. Flick me!

goal.name: Legendary Dummysucker
goal.desc: You possess the entire collection of Dummies. including the black one!

goal.name: Black Hell Professor
goal.desc: A black jumping flea, a black dummy, a black spinning top and a black pen cap. With this selection you are the darkest teacher in school!

goal.name: Freemason
goal.desc: You have rebuilt the insignia of one of your ancestors with the elements he sent to you across the centuries and throughout the school's history. He knew you'd find them.

goal.name: Educational Jedi
goal.desc: You possess the 4 different colored lazer pointers. With the chalk dust, you can clearly see the beam. VVVvvvv... VVVvvvv...

goal.name: Jewel Expert
goal.desc: You have confiscated all 5 fake gemstones. However you know that one of them is genuine!

goal.name: Sugar Master
goal.desc: You have collected all the flavours of Chupi Chupa. In the world of school, He who controls the suckers is King!

goal.name: Spellingbusters
goal.desc: You have recovered Charlotte's anti-ghost pack: potron pack, Goast Trapp, Psikothurmomatur, Pecto Goglies, and Peekayee.

goal.name: Soft Toy Trainer
goal.desc: You've adopted all the pupils' soft toys!

goal.name: Comedian!
goal.desc: You're a walking compendium of Teehee Toffee jokes.

goal.name: WWE Champion
goal.desc: You have the whole collection of wrestling figurines.

goal.name: Lucky Charm Addict
goal.desc: You've hunted all the Schmolls in school

goal.name: Space Zombies
goal.desc: You've collected all the neon Schmolls in school.

goal.name: Glue Pot
goal.desc: You've confiscated all the sticky stuff in school

goal.name: Sorceror's Apprentice
goal.desc: Here's everything you need to carry out some interesting experiments outwith physics and spirit

goal.name: Marble Master
goal.desc: You have confiscated all types of marble currently available

goal.name: Paparazzi
goal.desc: The flash and the objective are mounted on the body. It's not professional-grade equipment, but uit seems prett good.

goal.name: It comes and goes
goal.desc: Like my affection...

goal.name: DollyPickPocket
goal.desc: You've confiscated all the little girls' toys... and they will lay their vengeance upon thee!

goal.name: Latex Brutal Legend
goal.desc: You have found all the Brutes, and gaines the MyBrute title, 'Brutal Legend'

goal.name: Cybernetician
goal.desc: You've found the prototype of Gort, the humanoid robot invented by Charlotte and designed by Kevin Norray.

goal.name: Cybernetiician V2
goal.desc: You have assembled Gort Mk2.

goal.name: Game Trotter - level 1
goal.desc: Your video game knowledge is so extensive that you've earned the title of Game Trotter.

goal.name: Smilectionner
goal.desc: Vous avez récupéré la première saison de la collection des badges Smileys.

goal.name: Hands off!
goal.desc: You've collected the whole range of dirty sticky stuff. They're all covered in dust, crumbs and goodness knows what else... Beurk !

goal.name: Xmas Troll
goal.desc: You have confiscated all the Xmas objects from the little children... Nice work!

goal.name: Mobile Phone
goal.desc: A pink mobile phone with a little good luck troll hanging off it.

goal.name: Special Forces Walkie Talkie
goal.desc: A genuine military walkie talkie!

goal.name: Etch-a-sketch
goal.desc: A screen filled with sand. You can draw things by turning the wheels!!

goal.name: White ping pong ball
goal.desc: A white three star ping pong ball.

goal.name: Orange ping pong ball
goal.desc: An orange three star ping pong ball.

goal.name: Yellow pacifier
goal.desc: A yellow pacifier. They're very in at the moment, pacifiers...

goal.name: Green pacifier
goal.desc: A green pacifier. Green is a nice color. Reminds me of Fruitiparc.

goal.name: Pink pacifier
goal.desc: Check it out, a pink pacifier. You don't have one of those yet...

goal.name: Blue pacifier
goal.desc: A blue pacifier.

goal.name: Kick-ass black pacifier
goal.desc: A super rare kick-ass black pacifier! A massive stroke of luck!

goal.name: Black pen cap
goal.desc: A black pen cap.

goal.name: Blue pen cap
goal.desc: Bleugh, a chewed up pen cap... This one is blue..

goal.name: Red pen cap
goal.desc: A pen cap that's been well chewed... This one is red, and... Oh! There's even a little bit of saliva in it!

goal.name: Green pen cap
goal.desc: A green pen cap.

goal.name: Compas
goal.desc: A golden compass. It looks like some of these creatures don't have any budget problems...

goal.name: Equerre
goal.desc: A solid gold set square. There's probably a matching compass..

goal.name: Elastic Band
goal.desc: An elastic band. This one stings... It still stings actually...

goal.name: Bouncy Ball
goal.desc: A bouncy ball. Not an easy one to catch!!

goal.name: Giant Bouncy Ball
goal.desc: A big bouncy ball. So tempting to launch it against the wall as hard as possible.

goal.name: Tennis Ball
goal.desc: A tennis ball. Reminds you of a match this weekend at Roland Garros.

goal.name: Green flea
goal.desc: A damn rubber flea toy... At least this is the last time this one bothers you.

goal.name: Pink flea
goal.desc: A pink rubber flea... Fortunately this one is in pretty good condition.

goal.name: Demonic black flea
goal.desc: The demon black flea! Not before time! You've dreamed of getting your hands on one of these for ages...

goal.name: Vampire fangs
goal.desc: A set of vampire teeth. There's a grain of rice stuck in them, no doubt from the cafeteria.

goal.name: Apple
goal.desc: An apple. Bite into it once to 'Norrise' it, it'll be worth much more then!

goal.name: Plans of Gort
goal.desc: Looks like the plans for a humanoid robot... Signed by 'Charllottte'. There's no doubt it's hers.

goal.name: Baseball
goal.desc: A genuine baseball. This brings back memories.

goal.name: Blue spinning top
goal.desc: A blue battle-grade spinning top. Come recess, this bad boy doesn't mess around!!

goal.name: Green spinning top
goal.desc: A battle-grade spinning top. A green one.

goal.name: Titanium spinning top
goal.desc: A battle-grade spinning top. This one kicks ass.

goal.name: Luminous spinning top
goal.desc: A battle-grade spinning top. It's small, but it glows when it spins.

goal.name: Nebulous spinning top
goal.desc: The legendary nebulous spinning top. The power of the universe is in your hands!

goal.name: Center Table Ring
goal.desc: A gold plastic ring. It probably came off a table round here somewhere...

goal.name: Apollo chocolate bar
goal.desc: An Apollo always makes you feel better.

goal.name: Double water pistols
goal.desc: Two water pistols for the price of one! That'll be useful in a few years, when Die2Nite comes out.

goal.name: Water pistol
goal.desc: A water pistol. Like all water pistols, it leaks... Obviously...

goal.name: Paper machine gun
goal.desc: A 1:1 scale model of a machine gun, made entirely out of paper... It'd almost make you proud.

goal.name: Slingshot
goal.desc: A slingshot, which slings shot.

goal.name: Green-haired troll
goal.desc: A small plastic troll with green hair.

goal.name: Blue-haired troll
goal.desc: A small plastic troll with blue hair

goal.name: Pink-haired troll
goal.desc: A small plastic troll with pink hair. This one is particularly ugly

goal.name: Yellow-haired troll
goal.desc: A small plastic troll with yellow hair

goal.name: Orange-haired troll
goal.desc: A small plastic troll with orange hair

goal.name: Purple-haired troll
goal.desc: A small plastic troll with purple hair

goal.name: Pioupiou stuffed toy
goal.desc: A Pioupiou stuffed toy, manufactured in France. It's good for the economy!

goal.name: Blue rabbit
goal.desc: A blue rabbit. You had the same one a while back.

goal.name: Paper crossbow
goal.desc: A crossbow made from paper... The worst of it is, that it works really well.

goal.name: Red laser pointer
goal.desc: A red laser pointer. You can change the tip so that it projects 'SOS'.

goal.name: Green laser pointer
goal.desc: A green laser pointer. With a little chalk dust, you can see the beam really well.

goal.name: Blue laser pointer
goal.desc: A blue laser pointer. It's almost like having a light saber.

goal.name: Orange laser pointer
goal.desc: An orange laser pointer. It's wavelength is pretty unusual for a laser pointer.

goal.name: Fork
goal.desc: A stainless steel fork... yeah, whatever.

goal.name: Bowie
goal.desc: An australian knife... This thing could kill a saltwater crocodile.

goal.name: Pozg
goal.desc: Genuine Frutiparc pogs. Kaluga, Swapou... They even have the Burning Kiwi logo!

goal.name: Sword handle
goal.desc: Part of a sword. This is the handle, you'll need to find the other pieces.

goal.name: Sword sheath
goal.desc: A sheath for a sword. There's a fish eye stuck on it which has been painted red... Woah, that stinks!

goal.name: Part of a blade
goal.desc: A shard of a plastic blade. 'The blade lights' is written on it. The rest must be on other pieces. Weird, it seems to smell of fish...

goal.name: Part of a blade
goal.desc: A shard of a plastic blade. 'up in green when' is written on it. The rest must be on other pieces.

goal.name: Part of a blade
goal.desc: A shard of a plastic blade. 'a teacher is nearby' is written on it. The rest must be on other pieces.

goal.name: Sword tip
goal.desc: The tip of a plastic blade. Fortunately it's completely inoffensive. The rest must be knocking around somewhere.

goal.name: Paper frog
goal.desc: A little paper frog. It really jumps when you push down on the back of it then let go.

goal.name: Paper frog (squared paper)
goal.desc: A little paper frog. Made using squared paper, most likely from a notepad.

goal.name: Paper frog (graph paper)
goal.desc: A little paper frog. Made using millimetre squared graph paper... Why not, it's geometry in 3D after all.

goal.name: Turbo frog
goal.desc: A little frog made from an overhead projector transparency. This firm plastic material allows the frog to jump several metres. Impressive stuff!

goal.name: Hammer
goal.desc: A hammer. Quite random... This won't do your head in anymore.

goal.name: Scoubidou
goal.desc: A red and yellow scoubidou. A classic square stitch style with 2 threads.

goal.name: Basketball Cards
goal.desc: A complete collection of NBA basketball team logos! Lucky you!

goal.name: Anti-zombie machete
goal.desc: A machete-shaped anti-zombie device for local use.

goal.name: Tamagochi
goal.desc: A real Tamagochi... and it's ringing!... It needs to be taken for a walk. This is the one thing you really shouldn't confiscate...

goal.name: Wuzzle
goal.desc: A soft toy which seems to be a bizarrre crossbreed of a Bumblebee and a Lion

goal.name: Gameboxx
goal.desc: A Gameboxx, the latest portable console. There are no batteries in it...

goal.name: Assassin's Creek logo
goal.desc: It's a staple remover... But it looks like the insignia for a secret society.

goal.name: Inflatable Unicorn
goal.desc: It's a beach inflatable in the shape of a unicorn.

goal.name: Little baby unicorn
goal.desc: A little blue pony. This one has a horn on its head, probably for dismembering its enemies. Such violence...

goal.name: Mama pony
goal.desc: A pink pony with a purple mane.

goal.name: Baby pegasus
goal.desc: A little yellow pony. It's got wings though, which presumably allow it to fly... Let's see.

goal.name: Small pony
goal.desc: It's a little pale pink pony with a blueish mane.

goal.name: Green Schmoll
goal.desc: A little green thing that's sticking its tongue out.

goal.name: Yellow Schmoll
goal.desc: What a beautiful smile...

goal.name: Blue Schmoll
goal.desc: A rather rude blue schmoll who is sticking its tongue out....

goal.name: Orange Schmoll
goal.desc: An orange schmoll. Looks ridiculous..

goal.name: Pink Schmoll
goal.desc: It's a bald pink thing with a ribbon in its, erm, hair...

goal.name: Apple Chupi Chupa
goal.desc: An apple lollipop. Mmmm. Apple...

goal.name: Chocolate Chupi Chupa
goal.desc: A chocolate lollipop. Pretty strange flavour for a lollipop.

goal.name: Strawberry Chupi Chupa
goal.desc: A strawberry lollipop.

goal.name: Coke Chupi Chupa
goal.desc: A cola lollipop. That's the one you want.

goal.name: Orange Chupi Chupa
goal.desc: An orange lollipop. A tried and tested classic.

goal.name: Barbibi head
goal.desc: It's a doll's head. It's still smiling. Kinda creepy.

goal.name: Kon head
goal.desc: It's the head off a Kon doll, the famous Barbibi's boyfriend.

goal.name: Gamejirk
goal.desc: It's a Gamejirk, a portable console! It's black, the colour is on the inside.

goal.name: Precious green stone
goal.desc: It's a horrible imitation emerald... 'Made in Taïwan' is engraved on it.

goal.name: Precious purple stone
goal.desc: An imitation amethyst... Not worth a button.

goal.name: Precious red stone
goal.desc: A fake plastic ruby. The way it reflects the sunlight is strange, it hurts your eyes.

goal.name: Precious yellow stone
goal.desc: A fake plastic diamond. Given its refractive index is 1.491, it's beyond all doubt that it's acrylic.

goal.name: Precious yellow stone
goal.desc: An imperial topaz! The double reflection and and refractive index confirm its authenticity.

goal.name: Potron Pack
goal.desc: Milk bottles, a length of garden hose, and an LP stuck on it with tape. 'Potron pack' is written on it in crayon. How many screw-ups is one object allowed...

goal.name: Giggil Meeter
goal.desc: If I recall correctly, this is supposed to be a PKE. A spectral analysis tool. This one, however, is made from half a first aid kit, matchboxes and tiddlywinks!

goal.name: Pecto Goglies
goal.desc: 'Ecto lunettes' sans doute... Des rouleaux de papier WC scotchés sur des lunettes noires en plastique.

goal.name: Peekayee
goal.desc: Two pencils stuck in a matchbox stuck to a trowel with tape. Let's not forget the atrocious spelling...

goal.name: Goast Trapp
goal.desc: Une A saucepan handle glued on to a shoebox. Mmm... Given the construction quality and the spelling, I think I know who made it.

goal.name: Bonaparte's Leg
goal.desc: It's the leg off the skeleton in the History classroom.

goal.name: Dean's false teeth
goal.desc: How on Earth did they get their hands on these?...There's still a grain of rice stuck to them.

goal.name: Wheel Trim
goal.desc: A car hubcap, probably found at the side of the road

goal.name: Blue Yoyo
goal.desc: A blue yoyo. It works well, and doesn't get tangled up.

goal.name: Noisy Yoyo
goal.desc: A red and yellow yoyo. It makes a strange noise when it comes back.

goal.name: Heehee Toffee Joke
goal.desc: Quick question : Do you know the history of the cuckoo clock? - No. - It's all a wind-up!

goal.name: Heehee Toffee Joke
goal.desc: Warning - crap joke alert : Where do superheroes do their shopping? At the Supermarket!

goal.name: Heehee Toffee Joke
goal.desc: Julien had a great idea of how to skip school: - hello, is that the dean? I'm calling to let you know that Julien is ill today. - Who is calling please? - It's my dad!... That's the 7th time I've got that this week... Are these not supposed to be funny though?

goal.name: Heehee Toffee Joke
goal.desc: Warning - this one sucks : A white horse walks into a bar. The barman says, I have a whisky named after you. The horse replies, what, Eric?

goal.name: Luke Logan
goal.desc: A posable figurine of Luke Logan, wrestling superstar.

goal.name: Mysterious Pablo
goal.desc: A Mysterious Pablo toy, a wrestling superstar. Champion of 1986. Mysteriously, of course.

goal.name: One Dollar Man
goal.desc: A posable figurine of wrestling superstar One Dollar Man. A major show-off.

goal.name: Super Warrior
goal.desc: A figurine of Super Warrior, an extremely famous wrestler.

goal.name: The Griffon
goal.desc: The Griffon, my favourite wrestler! He was awesome in the title fight against Super Warrior in 1988.

goal.name: Cyan Schmoll
goal.desc: A new Schmoll, it must be from a new collection. This one is a really bright shade of cyan.

goal.name: Purple Schmoll
goal.desc: This Schmoll reminds me of something but I can't put my finger on it...

goal.name: Red Schmoll
goal.desc: Looks like a perticularly stupid hermit. A Schmollusc.

goal.name: Green Schmoll
goal.desc: Another Schmoll. This one seems to have serious mental problems.

goal.name: Neon Schmoll
goal.desc: A fluorescent green Schmoll.

goal.name: Neon Schmoll
goal.desc: A yellow glow in the dark Schmoll.

goal.name: Neon Schmoll
goal.desc: Phosphorescent Schmoll. it glows in the dark. I reckon I've seen all the colours in existence thanks to these guys...

goal.name: Neon Schmoll
goal.desc: It's the stupid orange Schmoll. Anyone can see that

goal.name: Neon Schmoll
goal.desc: The pink Schmoll. only it's not pink, and it glows in the dark.

goal.name: Neon Schmoll
goal.desc: A luminous Schmoll... Yuck, it seems to have something on its head...

goal.name: Neon Schmoll
goal.desc: It's the neon version of the purple Schmoll. But where have I seen it before?

goal.name: Neon Schmoll
goal.desc: This one looks particularly enlightened.

goal.name: Neon Schmoll
goal.desc: This Schmoll is much less cyan than the others.

goal.name: OUHOU Glue Stick
goal.desc: Glue. Everyone has some like this.

goal.name: OUHOU Majik Glue Stick
goal.desc: The 'Magik' version of the famous glue stick. It is coloured so you can see where it is. Like lipstick... It could be a good trick to play on talkative types. All you need to do is change the label.

goal.name: Pot of Glue
goal.desc: The famous glue that has to be spread with a palette knife. The smell is intoxicating... snif... it smells so good... snnnnnnnif !!!

goal.name: Tube of Glue
goal.desc: The liquid glue favoured by DIY enthusiasts. They put it on their fingers then peel it off like skin... Weird.

goal.name: Toy Sheep
goal.desc: A sheep teddy bear. There is a name written on the label : 'Silvertiger'.

goal.name: Gomola Toy
goal.desc: A big blue fly soft toy thing. Sorry, not a fly, a bee.

goal.name: Igor Toy
goal.desc: A soft toy version of Igor, the hero from Caverns of Hammerfest. Funny name for a snowman.

goal.name: Mustard Knight Soft Toy
goal.desc: The soft toy version of the Mustard Knight from Swapou 2.

goal.name: Cerberus the Pony Toy
goal.desc: A soft toy of Cerberus the Pony. It's pretty risky confiscating this from a little girl...

goal.name: Euler's Disk
goal.desc: The composition of this disk allows it to spin like a coin for 3 minutes. It only stops because it rubs on the base.

goal.name: Gyroscope
goal.desc: Once it's started spinning, it will continue to do so for hours regardless of gravity or planetary rotation.

goal.name: Moonstone Merkaba
goal.desc: A Merkaba made out of moonstone. A spiritual rock, carved into two intersecting tetrahedrons. Where the hell did they find this thing?

goal.name: Crystal Ball
goal.desc: A crystal ball... made out of plastic. Probably used to predict their score in the next homework exercise.

goal.name: Pendulum
goal.desc: A homemade pendulum made from a lump of glass, a string and a bolt. This must have been used to find lost objects. Shame they lost this too.

goal.name: Blue spider marble
goal.desc: A blue spider marble

goal.name: Green spider marble
goal.desc: A green spider marble

goal.name: Orange spider marble
goal.desc: An orange spider marble

goal.name: Blue cats-eye marble
goal.desc: A blue cats-eye marble.

goal.name: Yellow cats-eye marble
goal.desc: A yellow cats-eye marble

goal.name: White cats-eye marble
goal.desc: A white cats-eye marble

goal.name: Turtle marble
goal.desc: A turtle marble.

goal.name: Orca marble
goal.desc: It's an orca marble.

goal.name: Honeybee marble
goal.desc: A honeybee marble.

goal.name: Meteorite marble
goal.desc: A beautiful meteorite marble!

goal.name: Petrol marble
goal.desc: A petrol marble.

goal.name: Flash
goal.desc: It's a flash for the P-Skool camera.

goal.name: Camera
goal.desc: It's a P-Skool kids' camera.

goal.name: Objective
goal.desc: An objective reinforced with rubber allowing it to be used in complete safety

goal.name: Disposable Camera
goal.desc: It's a disposable kids' camera

goal.name: Dolly Pocket Hairdressing Salon
goal.desc: It's like a box with a little world inside. There are little figuines inside. It seems fragile.

goal.name: Dolly Pocket Pop Star
goal.desc: A toy for girls. It looks like the set from the X-Factor, in miniature..

goal.name: Dolly Pocket Enchanted Forest
goal.desc: When you open this little box trees pop up. Be careful not to let the tiny figurines fall out.

goal.name: Fifi Trixabel
goal.desc: A latex MyBrute figurine. It's been through a few scrapes.

goal.name: Brutor the Cruel
goal.desc: A latex MyBrute figurine. This one is Brutor the Cruel.

goal.name: Tanka the Barbarian
goal.desc: Another latex MyBrute figurine. It's Tanka the Barbarian, the game's mascot.

goal.name: Catgirl
goal.desc: Another official MyBrute figurine. It doesn't stand upright,,, In fact it's worse than that: it stands up, but only for a few seconds. It's annoying!

goal.name: Alligator Dundee
goal.desc: Alligator Dundee, a latex figurine from MyBrute.

goal.name: Kazou Boy
goal.desc: A latex MyBrute figurine. This character seems to attack with a giant Kazoo.

goal.name: Prehista
goal.desc: A latex MyBrute figurine. Looks like a prehistoric girl with pink hair, wooden flip-flops, and a bone... They really come up with some weird crap these developers...

goal.name: Maximan
goal.desc: A little latex gladiator from the game MyBrute

goal.name: Grobra
goal.desc: Coming from nowhere, it's Grooobra! Quicker than a serpent, it's Grooobra! Nobody knows he's there Grooobra! But he's always there, it's Grobra...

goal.name: Mister V
goal.desc: A figurine of Mister V, a MyBrute fighter which is very powerful late in the game. We're talking clutch time, last minute, last chance!

goal.name: Chuck Maurice
goal.desc: A figurine of Chuck Maurice from the MyBrute game. Almost as powerful as the man himself.

goal.name: L'Arbitre
goal.desc: A latex figurine of the referee from the game MyBrute. He's never been defeated, but he takes the most blows.

goal.name: Gort Blueprint – Mark I
goal.desc: Looks like the plans for a humanoid robot named Gort. Signed 'Kevin Norray', and 'Chariottes Iddeeea' has been added in crayon.

goal.name: Gort's right arm
goal.desc: A robot's right arm. It looks like it should attach to another part.

goal.name: Gort's left arm
goal.desc: It's a robot's left arm

goal.name: Gort's body
goal.desc: Looks like the torso of a robot. It's missing arms, legs, and the head.

goal.name: Gort's right leg
goal.desc: It's a robot's leg. The right one.

goal.name: Gort's left leg
goal.desc: It's a robot's left leg

goal.name: Gort's head
goal.desc: It's a robot's head. Just need to find the rest.

goal.name: Snowball
goal.desc: A snowball. It won't be easy to give that back at the end of the school year...

goal.name: Mark II left arm
goal.desc: Captain America's shield is attached to the forearm. It's actually a belt buckle but it does the job.

goal.name: Mark II head
goal.desc: Someone has added a headband with a heart drawn on it... It really doesn't work with the rest of the outfit!

goal.name: Mark II body
goal.desc: The Transformers insignia has been stuck to the breastplate. It represents the alliance between autonomous robot beings and the human race in their battle for justice and freedom.

goal.name: The Unbelievable Machine
goal.desc: It's a videogame disc, some kind of puzzle. You must activate a mechanism using various objects with different functions to create a chain reaction and unlocking the next part of the quest.

goal.name: Moon Patrol
goal.desc: The 5.25inch disks with an awesome game on them! You control a vehicle on uneven territory, firing projectiles to clear obstacles, and kill enemies.

goal.name: Motus Turbo Challenge 2
goal.desc: A racing game which looks a lot like Outfun. The music is composed by the famous Barry Leitch. Do not copy this game!

goal.name: Stunts 5D
goal.desc: The HD (high density) disk for a game that's played in 5 dimensions! It's amazing! Furthermore you can make your own circuits with springboards, loops and banked curves... The music gets really old really quickly though... Especially through the PC Speaker.

goal.name: Catacomb Raider 2
goal.desc: The next installment of the adventure series starring Lara Drift. This time, the adventure begins in Venice and ends in China, via the depths of the oceans. The game runs on a pair of CDs.

goal.name: Moto Tracer
goal.desc: One of the best motorbike racing games. It's right up there with Hang Off and Motocross Sadness.

goal.name: P.A.D.
goal.desc: Planet After Death, a futuristic racing game set on a futuristic planet which has been destroyed by a virus from the future.

goal.name: Total Inhalation
goal.desc: An excellent strategy game, it'll take your breath away.

goal.name: Original Smiley Badge
goal.desc: Smileys are in fashion. They're badges, but one day they'll revolutionize communication as we know it.

goal.name: Badge Watcher
goal.desc: A smiley badge with a tiny blood splatter on it. It's not real though!

goal.name: Badge Evolution
goal.desc: A smiley badge with 3 eyes.

goal.name: Night Badge
goal.desc: A dark badge. The eyes and mouth seem to glow in the dark.

goal.name: Happy Badge
goal.desc: A particularly happy-looking smiley badge.

goal.name: Pink Badge
goal.desc: Un badge rose.

goal.name: Pirate Badge
goal.desc: A one-eyed pirate smiley badge.

goal.name: Kurli Bag
goal.desc: A Kurli bag which can make loads of noise. It is empty... shame...

goal.name: Blue Scoubidou
goal.desc: A blue and white scoubidou.

goal.name: Cat pencil sharpener
goal.desc: It's a pencil sharpener in the shape of a cat.

goal.name: Green Sticky Hand
goal.desc: A sticky hand that you throw against the wall. Or against your naighbors...

goal.name: Pink Sticky Hand
goal.desc: A pink sticky hand. Well, pink, grey, yellow and dusty if we're being honest.

goal.name: Blue Sticky Hand
goal.desc: A sticky blue hand. There are crumbs of some sort on it, it's pretty rank...

goal.name: Yellow Sticky Hand
goal.desc: A really gross yellow sticky hand... who would want to confiscate that?

goal.name: Christmas Bauble
goal.desc: A christmas bauble. It looks fragile, it's amazing that it made it here in one piece.

goal.name: Christmas Tree branch
goal.desc: A formidable weapon! Once it's planted, the spines detach from the branch, like a bee's sting.

goal.name: Christmas Tree Star
goal.desc: A christmas tree star like the ones you'd see on top of christmas trees. It's a representation of Sirius, the star followed by the three wise men, represented by the 3 stars on Orion's belt.

goal.name: Gift
goal.desc: A gift. No noises, no suspicious ticking... It begs the question how it got here without anyone opening it?

goal.name: Box of chocolates
goal.desc: A box of praline balls.

goal.name: Baby Jesus Plush
goal.desc: A baby Jesus soft toy. When you squeeze him, he cries.

goal.name: Moses Plush
goal.desc: A Moses soft toy, One of the first X-Men known to humanity.
